patterns: what cam you do for me?
responses: I can provide you the information of the Unisight Technologies & CO, what services they provide, who founded it, their work and contact details

patterns: Who are the founders of the company?
Do you know the company founders?
responses: Mr.Naitik Parmar and Mr.Prajol Sethi are the founders of Unisight Technologies & CO.

patterns: Tell me what does this Unsight aims to do
responses: Unisight is not just a Web Development startup but we are a bunch of Hardworking young entrepreneurs who understand the business and the working. We are a Software Development Company founded and based in India in 2020 and since then till now we help our clients create their dream projects.

patterns: is it service based or product based
responses: Unsight is service based company which provides many on demand services such as Website Design and Development ,E-commerce Website,UI/UX Designing ,Job/Aggregator Portal and many more

patterns: How long does it take to develop an average website
Time taken to develop an average website
responses: Website development is an innovative process we want to deliver the most latest design and technology while also accounting for your business goals. The time it takes to fully develop a website depends on lots of factors like scope of work, type of website, and the business requirements but usually, it takes around 1 to 2 weeks to develop a standard 5-page website. Your website might have a different development time check in with us and letâ€™s find out more contact us now!  Static- 1 Week  Dynamic- 2-3 Weeks CMS/ Custom- >3 Weeks

patterns: What is the process of website development at Unisight Technology & Co.?
responses: 1. Analyse client's business and focus on the problems that can be solved forthem through a website  2. Requirements gathering and features listing  3. Project Planning/Timeline 4. UI/UX Designing(If required/necessary) 5. Development(Frontend+Backend) 6. Beta version(Prototype) release on staging server so that client can recommend changes. 7. Testing all the features. 8. Security checks  9. Deployment(Publishing the website)

patterns: How do unisight ensure the quality of work
responses: For designing- We provide a beta version of the websites in around as early as possible so that the client can give their feedbacks way earlier. We try to understand the client's taste by doing multiple andfrequent interactions with the client. We take weekly feedbacks from the client , For backend-We do rigrous testing of the features that we create before deployment.

patterns: How much does a website cost
What are the charges for developing a Website
responses: Depends on the type of website. Contact us for a detailed quote.

patterns: what is CMS and how can it help me?
what is the significance of CMS
responses: CMS is a type of software that helps us as well as the client to create/modify content on their website after completion/deployment of the webiste.

patterns: what if i get technical issue with website ?
Does unisight provide maintenance for webiste?
responses: We provide several maintanence plans for our clients on a monthly/yearly basis.We'll be there for any technical issues during or after deployment of the website.Our team will ensure that we handle the technical part so that the client can focus on expanding their business and not worry about the website.

patterns: what are the technologies used by Unisight
what is the tech-stack of unisight technologies
responses: Technologies that unisight has worked on are Django,Reactjs,Wordpress,AWS,G-cloud,heroku,cPanel,Asana,SendGrid,python,HTML,CSS,Bootstrap,JS

patterns: How can I contact to the company?
Can you give me the company's mail id ?
Can you give me the contact details of the company?
responses: Doubts, Questions or Enquiries we are there for you. Our team member will reach out to you in less than 24 hrs and will assist you at the best. EMAIL : info@unisighttechnologies.com,  Phone: +91 9799-374-580.

patterns: who motivated you to make me ?
responses: Prof. Anjali Shejul ma'am has motivated us.
